item.title: How do you add monsters in your server? help please
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

find autospawn.cfg (pile of books)
right cick open with notepad
then youll see something like this

spawn = 2253      3088       3254      0           3088      3254      	088      3254      1           0

hopefully this turns out right…
anyways the 2253 is the npc id in this case i think its the wise old man
the 3088 is the x cordinate found by clicking ::mypos
the 3254 is the y cord
there 0 is height (ussualy 0 unless underground of has to do with jad)
the next 4 numbers id leave as 0 for now what they are is its range as in it walks around and thats cords of were to walk around
the 0 is walktype dunno… leave it 0 itl be fine
DONE!!

Read full topic
